root.user_info: 684 215 247 <性别>男</性别> <简介>人生有限,跳票无期</简介> <生日>2014-06-12</生日> http://tp1.sinaimg.cn/2689248660/180/5708600487/1 <昵称>ProtSilver</昵称> <地区>浙江 宁波</地区>

weibo.weibo_content: In Australia, you drive a Volkswagen Polo like a pro off road racing car. Lake Tyrrell best hidden lake ever, especially getting to mysterious north end. But with @ProtSilver here we found dat no even a road 'road' to get to this shattered mirror of the sky. 10/10 would go again.
